pull_request.title: Cleanup PQClean implementations
pull_request.body:
<!-- Please give a brief explanation of the purpose of this pull request. -->
I realized that there were many duplicates of certain PQClean directories, some with hyphens and some with underscores.  This PR removes those duplicates.

This PR also adds the MQDSS AVX2 implementation recently added to PQClean after syncing with PQClean.

<!-- Does this PR resolve any issue?  If so, please reference it using automatic-closing keywords like "Fixes #123." -->

<!-- Please answer the following questions to help manage version and changes across projects. -->

* [Yes] Does this PR change the input/output behaviour of a cryptographic algorithm (i.e., does it change known answer test values)?  (If so, a version bump will be required from *x.y.z* to *x.(y+1).0*.)
* [No] Does this PR change the the list of algorithms available -- either adding or removing?  (If so, PRs in OQS-OpenSSL, OQS-BoringSSL, and OQS-OpenSSH will also be required by the time this is merged.)

<!-- Once your pull request is ready for review and passing continuous integration tests, please convert from a draft PR to a normal PR, and request a review from one of the OQS core team members. -->

pull_request.title: Add HQC from PQClean take 2
pull_request.body:
<!-- Please give a brief explanation of the purpose of this pull request. -->
Adds HQC from PQClean.  HQC makes use of nistseedexpander so this adds that as well.

Depends on #803 

Replaces #804.

<!-- Does this PR resolve any issue?  If so, please reference it using automatic-closing keywords like "Fixes #123." -->
Fixes #709.

<!-- Please answer the following questions to help manage version and changes across projects. -->

* [No] Does this PR change the input/output behaviour of a cryptographic algorithm (i.e., does it change known answer test values)?  (If so, a version bump will be required from *x.y.z* to *x.(y+1).0*.)
* [Yes] Does this PR change the the list of algorithms available -- either adding or removing?  (If so, PRs in OQS-OpenSSL, OQS-BoringSSL, and OQS-OpenSSH will also be required by the time this is merged.)

Note that HQC-256 variants use lots of stack space (similar to Classic McEliece).  Downstream consumers will have to be updated to take this into account.

<!-- Once your pull request is ready for review and passing continuous integration tests, please convert from a draft PR to a normal PR, and request a review from one of the OQS core team members. -->
